Parameters: Number: Either int or float value.
directUpdate(java.lang.Number).Description: Directly update the target using a float or int value. Called when @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ParallaxTarget#isDirectMapping_E@ is true.

update(float).Description: Implementation class is supposed to update target with the provided fraction (between 0 and 1). The fraction represents percentage of completed change (e.g. scroll) on target. Called only when @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ParallaxTarget#isDirectMapping_E@ is false.

Returns: True if direct mapping, false otherwise.
isDirectMapping().Description: Returns true if the ParallaxTarget is directly mapping from source value, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ParallaxTarget#directUpdate_E@ will be used to update value, otherwise update(fraction) will be called to update value. Default implementation returns false.

ClassDesc: ParallaxTarget is responsible for updating the target through the @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ParallaxTarget#update_E@ method or the @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ParallaxTarget#directUpdate_E@ method when @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ParallaxTarget#isDirectMapping_E@ is true. When @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ParallaxTarget#isDirectMapping_E@ is false, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ParallaxEffect_E@ transforms the values of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#Parallax_E@, which represents the current state of UI, into a float value between 0 and 1. That float value is passed into @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ParallaxTarget#update_E@ method.
